website_summaries.verdict: It doesn’t matter if you own a rabbit, hamster, guinea pig, chinchilla, rat, mouse, or other adorable small pet, because they will go wild for these simple yet extra-healthy bits of all-natural freeze-dried strawberries.
pros: High in vitamin C and antioxidants
A treat the vast majority of small animals will appreciate
No added sugar, preservatives, or colorings
As natural as you can get
cons: These freeze-dried strawberry chunks aren’t as cheap as the competition, but if you need something extra-special for your small pet, it’s worth the price

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but my bunny tries to snatch the bag out of my hand
customer_reviews.text: I use strawberries only for a special treat when he gives hugs/snuggles/kisses as a reward and when he comes when I call him back from some place he should be. lol He loves them and will try to snatch the bag from my so I know they are good to him. I also like that there is no added sugar. I get them from Amazon at a lower price but otherwise they are very expensive for a treat. Lately Amazon has been out of stock so I found freeze-dried strawberries with no sugar at dollar tree of all places and he loves them too.
customer_reviews.author: IzzeTinVA

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this
customer_reviews.text: It's literally just freeze dried strawberry I could have gotten at a dollar store. Dont waste your money not worth the price at all
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I normally buy oxbows baked treats and break them into little pieces so I can give him smaller portions but more throughout the day, rather than two giant ones per day. The fact that these are already smaller peices with no added sugar is a bonus for me! My piggy Oliver loves this and I feel like you get a lot of product. The picture doesn’t look like it but it’s very full, more than half of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Piper

customer_reviews.title: Too much sugar!
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pig had three (3) pieces of dried strawberry. He developed diarrhea within two hours, and needed his butt bathed every day for a week. These may be okay for rabbits, but the sugar content is way, way too high to be safe for a guinea pig. Stick the the hay based treats for piggies.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline O'Malley

customer_reviews.title: Spock loves these
customer_reviews.text: My Hamster LOVES these treats. In fact Spock requires me to give him one at least once if not twice a day. I say to him they are 5 star. Update: These are Freeze dried Strawberry that's it not additives just the natural fruit freeze dried. For a less expenisve option, Trader Joes sells Freeze dried strawberries that are also just the fruit with no added surgars, gmo's, etc. So save some money and go to trader joes.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: My picky bunny loves these but...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 2lb bunny and she loved them but the bag doesn't come with much. I paid about $4 for these and so I decided to try some other ones next time. I bought the Natierra Nature's Organic Freeze-Dried Strawberries for $5 and it came with 2-3x the amount! There is nothing wrong with these ones from Oxbow but just not my top choice anymore.
customer_reviews.author: mom of 13

customer_reviews.title: My hamsters LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: We only feed our hamsters oxbow hamster food, and I had no idea they made these, until I searched to get them more of their food recently. These came up in the search results, so I bought them and omg, they LOVE them! They smell tempting enough to eat...srsly! We will definately be getting them more!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: My bunny loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My bunny loves this. He devours them! Put his whole head in the bag and will eat them all if I let him. So spoiled!
customer_reviews.author: Berry Wise

customer_reviews.title: Prince Charles “Chunk”; my chinchilla loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Prince Charles “Chunk”; my chinchilla MUST have this every day; if not, he throws a fit! I love him so much, and he loves these, so that’s good enough for me! I order four bags at a time as their hard to keep in stock on Amazon, it seems.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Motes

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Treat.
customer_reviews.text: We love these; My guinea pigs love these. We sprinkle them in hay for forging and sometimes In hiding places for a great surprise treat. I don’t put in food because they will eat that vs pellets.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: So good I'm almost tempted to eat them myself!
customer_reviews.text: These little treats smells so good. So good I'm almost tempted to eat them myself! Our bunny loves them soooo much. He gets very excited to eat these and will race around and zip in circles in anticipation for this berry goodness!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Popular pet snack in my house
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pig and hamster's favorite snack. I couldn't find them in any local store because they were sold out. Amazon to the rescue. And the price was great! I plan on buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Erica B.

customer_reviews.title: My rats love this treat
customer_reviews.text: My rats love this treat! The strawberries are perfectly cut into small pieces. I'm not worried about giving too much or having to cut up the treat for my baby rats--It's ready to serve! My older rat loves sweet treats, so this is a nice, natural treat for her. This is just freeze dried strawberries, so even I could eat them--And they smell great!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Great treat
customer_reviews.text: My bunny LOVES these! They’re broken into tiny bits so I can control how much she gets!
customer_reviews.author: Gwinnette Kocian

customer_reviews.title: Not much product for price😞
customer_reviews.text: For the cost of this treat the amount isn't worth the bag it's in. My bunny loves it tho just not much in the bag....
customer_reviews.author: KMB

customer_reviews.title: My bunny loved these
customer_reviews.text: My bunny got so excited as soon as I opened the bag. Kept trying to get more
customer_reviews.author: natalieg

customer_reviews.title: Hamster love them
customer_reviews.text: My hamster love these will definitely buy again quality ingredients
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer VanDuzer

customer_reviews.title: Good chinchilla treats
customer_reviews.text: My chinchilla likes them as a treat couple times a week, cant give him too many or I'll have a chubby chinchilla.
customer_reviews.author: The Acid Burn

customer_reviews.title: My guinea pig doesn’t like.
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pig popcorn sniffed it and walked away. The price and the non eligibility for prime makes it not a good deal for my buck. Your guinea pig may love it though.
customer_reviews.author: Redd

customer_reviews.title: Tasty treat or pellet additive
customer_reviews.text: I add this treat to the rabbit Oxbow pellets, it add variety to their pellets, each morning.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Wish they were cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Wish they were cheaper because for the amount you get is ridiculously to high
customer_reviews.author: WolfAngel

customer_reviews.title: My guinea pig loved them.
customer_reviews.text: My lil guinea pig loved them. It's a treat just remember that.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Jensvold

customer_reviews.title: So good.
customer_reviews.text: So awesome. No added sugar or dye. Found this on a rabbit care/health site and then looked it up for less on here. Bunny is so excited about these. The next best thing to fresh strawberries.
customer_reviews.author: Dead Not Sleeping

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My buns love these treats! I love that they have no added sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: My bunny does like these treats
customer_reviews.text: My bunny does like these treats, however I did not realize that they were just freeze dried strawberries. I should've read the description more closely, because I could buy a bigger bag elsewhere for much cheaper. This product isn't worth the extra expense.
customer_reviews.author: Joan R. Young

customer_reviews.title: Bunny loves, but not a lot in the package
customer_reviews.text: My bunny loves these, but I wish there were more in a package. They smell really good when I get them out for her, and she gets really excited and gobbles them down. I wish there was an option to buy a bigger package.
customer_reviews.author: txmom

customer_reviews.title: They are her favorite out of everything I give her
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pig, Lulu, loves these!! They are her favorite out of everything I give her. 💗
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Keeling

customer_reviews.title: Great my Guinea pigs love these some of my Guinea ...
customer_reviews.text: Great my Guinea pigs love these some of my Guinea pigs and Rabbits wont eat these but the ones that do love them
customer_reviews.author: Abbie G.

customer_reviews.title: Hunny Bunny's favorite treat
customer_reviews.text: My rabbit, Hunny Bunny, loves these treats! I feel guilty only giving these to her for treats. She tears into the bag. Spoiled Bunny. This lower price is awesome too!
customer_reviews.author: kim kelley

customer_reviews.title: Hamsters love it and priced much better than the pet stores
customer_reviews.text: My 2 hamsters love this stuff and for only 4 dollars or so well worth it. Will be buying again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Blanche Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Piggie approved!
customer_reviews.text: Really great! My guinea pigs absolutely loved these! Will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Taylar

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality strawberries this shipment...
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these treats all the time and the chinnies love them, my recent shipment was awful both packages contained old, brown clumped together strawberry pieces not fit for my animals.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Weitzel

customer_reviews.title: Guinea pig approved.
customer_reviews.text: Our Guinea pig loves this. He seem to be addicted to it. As soon as he seas us open the bag, he gets so excited.
customer_reviews.author: Mia G

customer_reviews.title: Delightful Treat!
customer_reviews.text: So fresh and healthy! My chinchillas loved this product. Really flavorful! Give as an occasional treat to your small pet. Oxbow has the healthiest products for small animals. I recommend this product as a delightful treat....
customer_reviews.author: K. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Sweet and tasty bunny treat
customer_reviews.text: My bunny really enjoys eating these treats. She is a finicky bugger and this is one of very few treats she enjoys. The texture is a bit spongy but she doesn't mind. She gets all excited when she hears me open the pouch and comes bounding out from wherever she is. I am excited to try some of the other Oxbow treats!
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pet rats never really liked these. Stick to yogis. Maybe it works great for other pets.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: It was very 👍🏼 nice
customer_reviews.text: It was VERY nice and my rabbit LOVED it! It was very much worth it!! Though...it did not have that much in it and didn’t last that long BUT I do VERY much recommend:—)
customer_reviews.author: amanda steed

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter's guinea pig. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Schunk

customer_reviews.title: Bunny treats
customer_reviews.text: Waiting for the bunny seal of approval...no stars on flavor cuz I didn't taste them.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: sowatch your fingers if you're hand-feeding
customer_reviews.text: My rabbit went crazy for these. They're very tuni pieces, so watch your fingers if you're hand-feeding. The smells is wonderful! I'll definitely be buying these again!
customer_reviews.author: Terri H.

customer_reviews.title: Guinea Pig Treats Review
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pig loves these! She does spins for them and rings a bell. Perfect training treats for small animals! They smell so good.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Copp

customer_reviews.title: Rabbit loves these strawberries!
customer_reviews.text: Our rabbit loves these! When our local pet store stopped carrying them I was so pleased to find them on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia R Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My holland lop loves these treats! My veterinarian recommended these.
customer_reviews.author: Landon Sams

customer_reviews.title: The buns are happy, I'm happy
customer_reviews.text: Oxbow rarely disappoints with their rabbit treats and this was no exception. Treats are how we train and reward our bunnies for good behavior and we have very picky rabbits. With Oxbow, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: T. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Hamsters likes them
customer_reviews.text: As long as they like it, I'm fine with it
customer_reviews.author: Yuri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My bun loves these, he comes running for them even when he's grumpy and thumpy
customer_reviews.author: ashlee

customer_reviews.title: ... knew simple dried strawberries could make a chinchilla SO happy? Like he literally likes them more than raisens
customer_reviews.text: Who knew simple dried strawberries could make a chinchilla SO happy? Like he literally likes them more than raisens
customer_reviews.author: Jcd

customer_reviews.title: Love love squeak
customer_reviews.text: My piggie loves these. Lots of little squeaks for these.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie M.

customer_reviews.title: Guinea pig really likes these treats. He's all over ...
customer_reviews.text: Guinea pig really likes these treats. He's all over them the minute they hit his kennel. Just the right size for small animals.
customer_reviews.author: Sioux Gee

customer_reviews.title: As with the other fruit rewards, my rabbit isn't ...
customer_reviews.text: As with the other fruit rewards, my rabbit isn't very fond of these but I feel she needs a variety of fruits so I give them to her occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our bunny loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Our bunny just loves these treats! We give him them just before bed every night and he is begging for them when he knows it is time for his favorite treat!
customer_reviews.author: Chele Hipp

customer_reviews.title: Guinea pigs love it. Some other snacks I tried weren't as ...
customer_reviews.text: Guinea pigs love it. Some other snacks I tried weren't as well liked.
customer_reviews.author: kdt

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my dwarf bunny wasn't to pleased with the treats but they looked good.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my chinchillas love these treats! they are their favorite treats to have.
customer_reviews.author: koryssa

customer_reviews.title: Gerbils/Guinea Pig LOVED these
customer_reviews.text: Gerbils and guinea pig loved these! These were great for hand-feeding gerbils.
customer_reviews.author: Opusquest

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: MY GUINEA PIGS LOVE THESE THINGS! THEY GET SUPER EXCITED WHEN I OPEN THE BAG!!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A huge hit with the bunnies. They bits are small so watch your fingers when feeding!
customer_reviews.author: lilacbluestone

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: My piggy just did not like them..... smell so good so I finally tasted one myself......ouuuuu...sour
customer_reviews.author: Eloise marks

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: They come in really small strawberry pieces, not sliced, almost cubed. They smell amazing and my fancy mice love them!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Botello

customer_reviews.title: Half and Half
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my rabbit and Guinea pig. Buddy (the Guinea pig) hates them, but, Mufasa loves them. Love opening the bag to smell fresh strawberries even though they're dried.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Davis

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Our bunny loves these sprinkled on her pellets and hidden in her toys every night. They are a great enticement to get her to eat enough food (she's a senior bun).
customer_reviews.author: Anne W

customer_reviews.title: My chinchilla is super happy to have his strawberry treats again
customer_reviews.text: Shipped very fast, thank you very much! My chinchilla is super happy to have his strawberry treats again!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Butler

customer_reviews.title: Rabbit wasn't really into these
customer_reviews.text: My rabbit wasn't into these. He ate them, but they sat in his cage for a day before he finally ate them. They smelled really wonderful though.
customer_reviews.author: SmittyGirl

customer_reviews.title: It's good quality stuff - but my rabbit doesn't like strawberries - even if they are real.
customer_reviews.text: It's good quality stuff - I even Ate a few of them - but Bunny won't eat it.... picky...I guess she doesn't like strawberry as I've given her a few over the past few months and she looks at me like I'm not eating that...what else you going to give me?
customer_reviews.author: jkeznord

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived stuck together and flat as a board. Completely useless
customer_reviews.author: Arielle A. McKelvey

customer_reviews.title: I only buy oxbow
customer_reviews.text: Two of my three rabbits won’t eat them. I didn’t realize they were freeze-dried. My own doing. So be it! Other oxbow treats and good are great!
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Alvarez

product_meta.title: Oxbow Simple Rewards Strawberry Treat
product_meta.description: Size:1Is there anything quite as naturally delicious as strawberries? your pet doesn't think so either. Unlike many Snacks on the market that contain added sugar, These premium strawberry treats consist of only 100% strawberries, Harvested and freeze dried at the peak of ripeness to ensure the freshest, best-tasting treat for your special pet. Simple rewards strawberry treats are a natural source of vitamin C and contain natural antioxidants. Use oxbow simple rewards treats to add variety and enrichment to your pet's diet. .5 oz. Bag.
feature_bullets: Bite-sized treat pieces are easy for your small pet to eat

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
